ValidationRule.description: SF-93 This validation rule should ensure, that all Zip Codes are in the correct format according to their respective country. Format ("[A-Z][0-9][0-9][0-9]"). Example: A999.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK( Construction_Site_Address__PostalCode__s )), ISPICKVAL( Construction_Site_Address__CountryCode__s , "SZ") ), NOT(REGEX(Construction_Site_Address__PostalCode__s , ("[A-Z][0-9][0-9][0-9]"))), FALSE) && $Permission.Core_Opportunity_Bypass_Validation_Rules = FALSE
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a valid format for the Zip Code! This should consist of an uppercase letter followed by three numbers. Example: A999
